Local interest

  • Thomas Wolsey: 500th anniversary of becoming Lord Chancellor of England

    Written by Emma Raindle on Dec 1, 2015

    500 years ago, on 24 December 1515, Thomas Wolsey was appointed Lord Chancellor of England. Learn more about the local man with these books and DVDs.

  • Local interest for December 2015

    Written by Brandon King on Nov 27, 2015

    The latest books about Suffolk history, recipes and celebrities.

  • Music at FolkEast 2015

    Written by Emma Raindle on Aug 4, 2015

    Artists available on CD or MP3 download from our catalogue, who will appear at FolkEast (held at Glemham Hall, Suffolk on 21-23 August).

  • Local interest for August 2015

    Written by Brandon King on Aug 3, 2015

    Books about Ipswich Town FC, East Anglian railways and the Elveden estate.

  • Children’s and teen authors at Latitude 2015

    Written by Jo Dixon on Jun 22, 2015

    Latitude Festival is held 16-19 July this year at Henham Park, Southwold. Here are some highlights from the children's authors appearing at the festival.

    Latitude Festival is held 16-19 July this year at Henham Park, Southwold. Here are some highlights from the authors appearing at the festival.

  • Music at Latitude 2015

    Written by Brandon King on Jun 18, 2015

    Latitude Festival is held 16-19 July this year at Henham Park, Southwold. Here are some music highlights in our catalogue from the acts appearing at the festival.
